ModMetaData.name: [O21] Outland - Vanilla Overhaul
ModMetaData.author: Neronix17
ModMetaData.description: Overhaul for Vanilla, Royalty and Ideology to bring everything from the game into a medieval fantasy period. Due to the nature of this module, compatibility may be an issue with other mods outside of the Outland series. If it works, great, if not then you'll have to choose, I've already done all I can to maintain compatibility when frankly it would have been easier to just not for this module.\n\nFor compatibility with the Vanilla Expanded series of mods check the mod description, there will be a link for another overhaul mod which specifically addresses those!
